meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one thousand cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts at one kilocycle per second.
meanings.sent2: The old radio could only tune in to kilocycles within a limited range.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally set the microwave to cook for one kilocycle instead of one minute!
meanings.sent4: The sound of the waves crashing on the shore seemed to match the kilocycles of my heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the machinery was a constant kilocycle in the background.

meanings.definition: A frequency of one thousand cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the signal frequency in kilocycles for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The kilocycle of the alarm clock woke me up at the same time every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring sounded like a soothing kilocycle lullaby.
meanings.sent4: The drummer's beats matched the kilocycle of the buzzing neon sign.
meanings.sent5: The flickering of the light bulb created a rhythmic kilocycle pattern on the wall.
